messages.message: Is there anyway to rerun the ibdoc via the fs to enable sig and checkboxs in dev or uat? i would like to use that for a demo this afternoon
@Rakesh @Hari any way to do it? also i thought already have checkboxes (but not signature) -- not sure if the model supports them though

This is supported both in Reader and model but we haven't enabled it due to performance constraints. Since we do not support custom Reader configuration where someone can enable/disable this, we couldn't run this by default on all docs, this is very expensive. This will be possible once we enable custom OCR setting which is in Q2 roadmap!

I may make an api call to get it to push the ibdoc into the documents folder with the appropriate settings. I should be able to run the reader async call with the input and output to maintain the folder structure
I dont think we would have an issue with an updated ibdoc in that folder right @Hari?

@joshbronko yes! But this also needs a model update where the checkbox model needs to do the text encoding differently than what we have in the platform. There is also an infra dependency where we may need model service to do checkbox inference. Currently none of the AIHub environments have model service setup for this. Can this wait until after the launch? We will provide a much easier way to do this.
i can just run it on a seperate platform and then copy over the ibdoc
have we made any modifcations to the ibdoc in aihub code base versus 23.04?

Nope there are no changes to IBDOC! Assuming the file path and everything will be taken care of when copied. But we need to make a small update in the environment where you are generating this IBDOC from. This will be a change to the Checkbox model output, and also pls note making this change means the checkboxes will not work in the Instabase platform.
can you explain the checkbox output?
In the IB platform checkbox detection embeds [CHECKED/UNCHECKED] to the text output. But for AIHub it should be something like [X]..
if its just check uncheck i think we should be good
ah okay so let me then run a change on the ibdoc with another udf afteward to change that
Let me know if you run into any issues.
